name: TamilHoliday
0:
”Alexa, open tamil holiday”
”Alexa, start tamil holiday”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tamil holiday
des: Open the skill and Alexa will automatically tell you how many days remain until all your upcoming leaves for Tamilnadu . Alexa can also remind you about the exact date for a specific events.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
